column4: i am reading the gftp's documentation and not sure what a bookmarks is
there is any gftp channel?
i know here is not the right place for asking about gftp
I don't see why not
i just thought this was a pure ubuntu support channel
I would assume (without really knowing) that a bookmark would be a site you do file transfer to/from on a regular basis?
I think general software questions are fine
ohhh, ok, thank you! :)
no problemo
as in, you would bookmark such a site
it is like a rapidshare site, or i am totally lost?
I think you lost me ;-)  What is the question?
ok, a bookmark it is just a site for transfer stuffs?

here's my idea (which could be wrong of course): if you use a web browser, you might bookmark your commonly visited web sites; in the same way, if you use gftp for transferring files, you might bookmark ftp sites (or whatever) that you frequently visit.  Does this make sense?
it's like saving on "my favorites" the sites i visit
yeah, or so I assume
yeah i think it made sense ^_^)!
OK :-)
ok thank you, i will continue my reading ^^! i'll be asking stuffs soon for sure
yw, have fun
i will ^^
